document_data.name: Vandanamer's
document_data.mainbody: '''Vandanamer's''' was a popular luthdren (restaurant) located in [[Khôltar]], [[south Faerûn]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|80}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 61: Khôltar, Part 12, A Tour of Dubrinlar}}
document_data.Location: This establishment was located near the western end of [[Hael Way]] on the south side of the street and on the southwest corner of the intersection with [[Galaglavur Street]]. Across Galaglavur Street was [[Krostur's Forge]]. Next door, to the west, was the [[Maerador House of Welcome]] and beyond that was Dubrinlar, the western gate into Khôltar. Across Hael Way was [[Manycoins Hall]].
document_data.Description: This luthdren had a dining area that was one very large room with a high ceiling. The stone architecture made it a noisy, echoing place when full of customers.
document_data.Services: A very popular luthdren, Khôltans mainly went here for an evening meal of [[roasted beef|roasted meat]] and soup. [[Rothé]] and [[ox]] carcasses were turned on [[spit]]s over open flames in the dining hall and the meat was trimmed off in full view of the customers. While the meat was served in thick slabs, the [[soup]]s tended to be thin, like [[broth]].
